description.message: Checks if URLs in the manifest are in scope and accessible

propertyNotFound.description: Report message when the property 'start_url' not found in manifest file
propertyNotFound.message: Property 'start_url' not found in manifest file

requestFailedFor.description: Report message when the request for 'start_url' fails

specifiedStartUrlNotAccessible.description: Report message when the response for 'start_url' has a status code !== 200

startUrlNotInScope.description: Report message when the 'start_url' is not in the scope of the app
startUrlNotInScope.message: 'start_url' is not in scope of the app.

startUrlMustHaveSameOrigin.description: Report message when the 'start_url' doesn't have the same origin as the manifest file
startUrlMustHaveSameOrigin.message: 'start_url' must have same origin as the manifest file.
